mainPage.about: — this is a team of experienced specialists who use modern technologies and innovative approaches to create high-quality products. We offer a wide range of services, including the development of customized software solutions, which allows us to adapt to the unique needs of each client.

internship.title: Internship
internship.description: We invite you to become part of our internship team, which will give you a chance to immerse yourself in the exciting process of business process automation and software development. With us, you will gain unique experience working on real projects, master advanced technologies, and be able to implement your ideas in a dynamic and supportive environment. Join us and start your career in an innovative company where your talent and creativity will be appreciated!

applicationForm.title: We'll be happy to answer your questions
applicationForm.description: Leave your contacts and we will get back to you

company.title: About the Company
company.description: PluhSoft is a team of experts specializing in software development and business process automation. Our mission is to help businesses grow, become more efficient, and adapt to modern challenges. We create solutions that optimize company operations, reduce costs, and improve customer service quality.

approach.title: Personalized Approach
approach.description: We study our clients' businesses and offer solutions that perfectly match their needs.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: Our team consists of specialists with deep technological knowledge and extensive project experience.

communication.title: Transparent Communication
communication.description: We establish open dialogue with clients, explaining technical aspects in simple terms and always staying available to discuss any questions.

internshipPage.title: Internship
internshipPage.description: We offer internships for aspiring professionals who want to immerse themselves in real projects, master modern tools, and gain practical experience in software development and business process automation.

results.title: Results
results.subtitle: What you will gain after the internship
results.commercialExperience: Commercial experience working on a project
results.projectSkills: Ability to create and defend projects

plan.info: The internship includes clearly structured stages that will help you gradually master development processes, apply the knowledge you’ve gained in practice, and create your first fully-fledged project.
plan.timeline: Work plan by months and weeks
plan.important: * The plan can be adapted depending on the number of interns, the complexity of current projects, and the tasks facing the team.
plan.teamwork: Teamwork: participating in planning, daily stand-ups, and code reviews
plan.POC: Demo a Proof of Concept (POC) for one of the key features
plan.conflict: Resolving merge conflicts and practicing with multiple pull requests
plan.interview: Conducting interviews with other interns under mentor supervision
plan.finishFirst: Completion of the first stage, start of work in an independent mode with minimal mentor involvement
plan.independentPlanning: Team independently plans and executes tasks
plan.idealProject: Intensive work on the project to bring it to perfection
plan.bugFixes: Fixing all remaining bugs and polishing features
plan.MVPFinish: Completion of the Minimum Viable Product (MVP)
plan.documentation: Creating documentation and materials for project defense

hexagons.currentTasks: Discussion of current issues and tasks
hexagons.connection: Code feedback and guidance on fixing errors
hexagons.presentation: Presentation of added features, documentation, and solutions
hexagons.callsInfo: Regular calls are an important part of the internship. They help establish teamwork, clarify tasks, and receive timely feedback.

form.contacts: Leave your contact details and write a short cover letter explaining why you'd like to intern with us.
form.whyIWant: Why I want to get an internship

projectsPage.title: Our Projects
projectsPage.getToKnow: Explore examples of successful projects completed by our company
projectsPage.companyGot: The company achieved the following results:

projects.title: Dilijan1
projects.descr: We implemented a solution that optimized order distribution, reduced vehicle dispatch time, and lowered operating costs. Thanks to the automation of business processes, the taxi service improved the quality of customer service and increased its profits.
projects.problem: The company faced difficulties in managing orders and distributing drivers, which led to delays and reduced customer service quality. The business required a modern automation system to optimize processes and enhance efficiency.

solutions.solution: We developed a mobile application that allows customers to quickly request a ride or cancel an order if necessary
results: Reduced waiting time for order confirmation

results: Reduced waiting time for order confirmation
